content: As soon as the three doctors had left the room, the Fairy went to Pinocchio's bed and, touching him on the forehead, noticed that he was burning with fever.
translations: ita:Appena i tre medici avevano lasciato la stanza, la Fata andò al letto di Pinocchio e, toccandolo sulla fronte, notò che
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
